annotations:
MV FLAT – UMX – OPENING @ EAST COAST INDIA O/A 18-19TH AUG
 
PREFER INDEX LINKED PERIOD / 1 TCT 
 
BOD: 450- 500 mts VLSFO and abt 75-85 mts  LSMGO.
 
YANGFAN GROUP CO. - SDARI 64 - BLT 2016
63.518 MT DWT ON 13.3 M DRFT(EXT)
LOA BEAM 199.90 m / 32.26 m
PANDI: LONDON PANDI
H&M: SWEDISH CLUB
 
IN LADEN
13.00 Kn / 25.0 MT including generators + 0.1 MT LSMGO
12.00 Kn / 22.0 MT including generators + 0.1 MT LSMGO
 
IN BALLAST
13.00 Kn / 22.5 MT including generators + 0.1 MT LSMGO
12,0 Kn / 19,5   MT including generators + 0.1 MT LSMGO
 
AT PORT IDLE : ABT 2,5MT VLSFO 380 CST + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
WORKING : ABT 4,5MT VLSFO 380 CST + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
BOILERS: ABT 1 MT VLSFO 380 CST + ABT 0,1 MT LSMGO
 
 
ALL SPEED/CONSUMPTION FIGURES ARE TO BE CONSIDERED AS ABOUT (+/- 0.5KNOT FOR SPEED AND +/- 5% FORCONSUMPTION) ARE ALWAYS SUBJECT TO GOOD WEATHER WHICH IS DEFINED AS NO ADVERSE CURRENT A/O NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL A/O MODERATE SEA, WIND
 NOT EXCEEDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 (FOUR) A/O DOUGLES SEA STATE 3 (THREE). PERIODS OF WEATHER EXCEEDING THE ABOVE DESCRIBED GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ARE TO BE EXPRESSELY EXCLUDED FROM THE EVALUATION OF VESSELS PERFORMANCE. NO EXTRAPOLATIONS TO BE MADE FOR WEATHER/SEA
 CONDITIONS OTHER THAN THOSE DESCRIBED ABOVE.CHARTERERS TO SUPPLY FIRST CLASS QUALITY BUNKERS STRICTLY COMPLYING WITH ISO 8217-2005(E), ENABLING MAIN ENGINE AND GENERATOR ENGINES TO OPERATE WITHOUT ANY HARMFULL EFFECTS.

BUNKER SPECS : IFO GRADE 380 CST RMG 35 ISO 8217- 2005(E) MDO GRADE DMA/DMB ISO 8217 - 2005(E) VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO USE MGO WHEN MANOUVERING, PASSING  NARROW STRAITS, CANALS , CONFINED RESTRICTED WATERS AND EXTREMELY COLD WEATHER.IN CASE CHARTERERS SUPPLY
 LOW SULPHUR MGO (DMA) FOR TRADING TO ECA + EU ZONES THE VISCOSITY TO BE MINIMUM 2-6 CST AT 40 DEGREES CELCIUS. BUNKER TESTING TO BE ORGANIZED BY OWNERS/MANAGERS BUT COST ALWAYS TO BE FOR CHRTS ACCOUNT.

ALL DETS ARE ABOUT. 
 
Oğulcan Sülek
Chartering
